text: Ronny van Es (born 22 May 1978 in Velsen, Netherlands) is a Dutch retired footballer. ==Club career== After his Portuguese adventure Van Es returned to his former club Stormvogels Telstar in 2004/2005. He went on a new foreign adventure in July 2007, when he signed a one-year contract at Greek second tier club PanthrakikosRonny van Es vindt onderdak in Griekenland - Voetbal International with an option for another year. He made a good 2007–08 season helping his Greek club to promote.Ronny van Es promoveert ook in Griekenland - Voetbal International Despite the successes, he signed a new 2-year contract at Cypriot side AEP Paphos until 2010.Profile at pafosfc.com On January 10, 2009 however he signed a contract and moved to Greek outfit Doxa Drama. He left after a half year Doxa Dramas of Greece and signed in the Netherlands with Topklasse team AFC.Spelers - Ron van Es ==Player agent== He retired in 2013Ronny van Es stopt bij AFC - Stadsblad de Echo to become a player agent, representing doping suspect Kevin van Essen among others.Zaakwaarnemer Van Es: "Kevin zit stuk" - NH Nieuws ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:People from Velsen Category:Association football forwards Category:Dutch footballers Category:SC Telstar players Category:HFC Haarlem players Category:Rio Ave F.C. players Category:F.C. title: Ronny van Es
